vote.motion-ch: 動議中止EC(2015-16)8號文件的討論
vote.motion-en: Motion that discussion on EC(2015-16)8 be now adjourned

vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理議員根據《人事編制小組委員會會議程序》第31A段擬動議的議案(編號：1)
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 31A of the Establishment Subcommittee Procedure (No. 1)

vote.motion-ch: 委員根據《人事編制小組委員會會議程序》第39A段動議於其後就相同的議程項目下的任何議案或待議議題進行點名表決時，委員會須在點名表決鐘聲響起一分鐘後立即進行各項點名表決
vote.motion-en: Motion moved by a member under paragraph 39A of the ESC Procedure that in the event of further divisions being claimed in respect of any motions or questions under the same agenda item, the Committee do proceed to each of such divisions immediately after the division bell has been rung for one minute

vote.motion-ch: EC(2015-16)8 – 建議在運輸及房屋局開設3個編外職位，為期2年4個月，以協調推展三跑道系統計劃的相關工作
vote.motion-en: EC(2015-16)8 – Proposed creation of 3 supernumerary posts in Transport and Housing Bureau for 2 years 4 months for coordinating related work in Three-Runway System project
